Every day, one ant appears (level 1).
Each day, ants produce an amount of food equal to their level, then gain one level.
The nest starts with 2 ants and 0 food.

Day 0: 2 ants (1,1)         -- 0 food
Day 1: 3 ants (2,2,1)       -- 2 food
Day 2: 4 ants (3,3,2,1)     -- 7 food
Day 3: 5 ants (4,4,3,2,1)   -- 16 food
Day 4: 6 ants (5,5,4,3,2,1) -- 30 food
Day 5: 7 ants (...)         -- 50 food
